https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/piM556g1zIH8UdLv69AKTodhioP.jpg Equal parts personal essay, intense rumination, and playful satire, this movie laments the death of the American Video Store while it searches for the missing human element in today's digital landscape. At the Video Store
